p: The VOC emission profiles were significantly impacted by the treatment. ANOSIM revealed significant structural differences for VOC profiles between treatments, with some overlapping ( R = 0.281, p = 0.002). On the other hand, PERMANOVA performed on the same data set revealed similar outcomes for comparisons between treatment ( F = 3.9517, p = 0.001 ∗∗∗). Pairwise PERMANOVA yielded significant differences for multiple comparisons in all cases, except for the no injection-control and mint-control, as shown in Table 1.
